javelin.model.unit

Class Combatant

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.unit.Combatant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Combatant
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, Cloneable
    A Combatant is an in-game unit, like the enemies in the battlefield or the named player characters. It contains the data that changes frequently during the course of battle, speeding up the cloning process for BattleNode replication by sharing the same reference to Monster among cloned instances.
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Combatant

        public Combatant(tyrant.mikera.engine.Thing visual,
                 Monster sourcep,
                 boolean generatespells)
        Parameters:
        generatespells - if true will create spells for this monster based on his Monster.spellcr. This is essentially a temporary measure to allow 1.0 monster who would have spell powers to use the currently implemented spells TODO
